articles.title: RR Kabel listing on expected lines, closes nearly 16% higher on debut - Moneycontrol
articles.description: RR Kabel is the first company to use T+2 timeline for listing of its shares after the IPO, instead of new timeline of T+3 (three working days after the closing of public issue) announced by the market regulator Sebi
articles.content:
RR Kabel shares closed the first day with nearly 16 percent gains despite sharp correction in the equity markets on September 20. The BSE Sensex plunged nearly 800 points.

articles.title: Union Bank of India defies correction in PSU lenders, stock rallies 3% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Union Bank of India has given a return of 109.08 percent over the last one year. The benchmark Nifty Bank index has given a return of 10.88 percent over the same duration.
articles.content:
